definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: His idea ofalienation was derived mostly from Hegel.
sentences.chinese: 他的关于异化的理念绝大部分脱胎于黑格尔。

sentences.english: That's the Hegelian theory of repetition in history.
sentences.chinese: 这就是黑格尔的在历史中重复的理论。

sentences.english: Hegel initiates a system of law philosophy in his Principles of Legal Philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔《法哲学原理》创立了法哲学学科体系。

sentences.english: Artistic beauty area is Hegel's "Aesthetics" the important concepts presented.
sentences.chinese: 艺术美范畴是黑格尔《美学》中提出的重要概念。

sentences.english: Comprehending Hegelian theory of tragedy must join together his philosophy thought.
sentences.chinese: 理解黑格尔悲剧理论必须结合他的哲学思想。

sentences.english: Kant and Hegel have developed idealism.
sentences.chinese: 康德和黑格尔发展了唯心主义。

sentences.english: Theory of Civil Society is an important part of Hegel's philosophy of politics.
sentences.chinese: 市民社会观是黑格尔政治哲学的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The questions of country and law are central contents in Hegel's philosophy of law.
sentences.chinese: 国家和法的问题是黑格尔法哲学体系中的重要内容。

sentences.english: What I detested more than anything else was Hegelianism and the Dialectic.
sentences.chinese: 我最讨厌的莫过于黑格尔体系和辨证法。

sentences.english: The central doctrine of Hegel's philosophy is the idea of purposive evolution.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔哲学的中心教义是有目的进化发展的思想。

sentences.english: What is the guile of Hegelian reason?
sentences.chinese: 什么是黑格尔的理性的狡计？

sentences.english: He can be regarded as "the father of behaviour concept in criminal law".
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔堪称“刑法学行为概念之父”。

sentences.english: In Hegelian phraseology the State is the reality of which justice is the ideal.
sentences.chinese: 在黑格尔的措辞中，国家则是完美正义的实现方式。
“8黑格尔→”自我意识的独立与依赖“。

sentences.english: Hegel was the first person who gave a precise definition to quality.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔在哲学史上第一次对质作出了准确的界定。

sentences.english: Obviously Hegelian Philisophy is a kind of modern philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔哲学显然是一种现代性的哲学话语。

definition: Baruch or Benedict Spinoza (1632-1677), rationalist philosopher
surname Althusser/Louis Pierre Althusser 路易·皮埃爾·阿爾都塞|路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞[Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1] (1918-1990), Marxist philosopher
Friedrich Engels (1820-1895), socialist philosopher and one of the founder of Marxism
